City Council
============

1149 Ellsworth Pasadena TX 77506

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1149+Ellsworth+Pasadena+TX+77506)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

1149 Ellsworth  
6th Floor  
Pasadena, TX 77506

Phone:

[713-475-7858](tel:7134757858)

[Email Council Admin](mailto:counciladmin@pasadenatx.gov)  
Link: [City Council Page](https://www.pasadenatx.gov/406/City-Council)
